00044   :TREX::utils::Exception(g.getName().str()+": "+msg) {}

00054 MultipleReactors::MultipleReactors(graph const &g, TeleoReactor const &r) throw()
00055   :GraphException(g, "Multiple reactors with the same name \""+

00062 // structors :
00063 
00064 graph::graph(Symbol const &name, TICK init) 
00065   :m_name(name), m_currentTick(init) {
00066 }
00067 
00068 graph::graph(Symbol const &name, ext_iterator const &conf, TICK init) 
00069   :m_name(name), m_currentTick(init) {
00070       size_t number = add_reactors(conf);
00071       syslog()<<"Created "<<number<<" reactors.";
00072 }
00073 
00074 graph::~graph() {
00075   clear();
00076 }
00077 
00078 TREX::utils::internals::LogEntry graph::syslog(std::string const &context) const {
00079   std::ostringstream oss;
00080   oss<<m_currentTick<<"]["<<m_name.str();
00081   if( !context.empty() )
00082     oss<<"."<<context;
00083 
00084   return m_log->syslog(oss.str());
00085 }
00086 
00087 void graph::clear() {
00088   while( !m_reactors.empty() ) {
00089     syslog()<<"Disconnecting \""<<m_reactors.front()->getName()<<"\" from the graph.";
00090     m_reactors.front()->isolate();
00091     m_reactors.pop_front();
00092   } 
00093 }
00094 
00095 long graph::index(graph::reactor_id id) const {
00096 #ifndef DEBUG
00097   size_t pos = 0;
00098   // not efficient at all !!!
00099   details::reactor_set::const_iterator i;
00100   for(i=m_reactors.begin();
00101       m_reactors.end()!=i && i->get()!=id; ++i, ++pos);
00102   return pos;
00103 #else
00104   return reinterpret_cast<long>(id);
00105 #endif
00106 }
00107 
00108 size_t graph::add_reactors(ext_iterator iter) {
00109   graph *me = this;
00110   xml_factory::iter_type it = xml_factory::iter_traits::build(iter, me);
00111   boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> reactor;
00112   size_t count = 0;
00113   
00114   while( m_factory->iter_produce(it, reactor) ) {
00115     std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool> 
00116       ret = m_reactors.insert(reactor);
00117     if( ret.second ) 
00118       syslog()<<"Reactor \""<<reactor->getName()<<"\" created.";
00119     else {
00120       throw MultipleReactors(*this, **(ret.first));
00121     }                   
00122     ++count;
00123   }
00124   return count;
00125 }
00126 
00127 graph::reactor_id graph::add_reactor(rapidxml::xml_node<> &description) {
00128   graph *me = this;
00129   TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type 
00130     arg = xml_factory::arg_traits::build(description, me);
00131   boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> tmp(m_factory->produce(arg));
00132   std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool> ret = m_reactors.insert(tmp);
00133 
00134   if( ret.second ) 
00135     syslog()<<"Reactor \""<<tmp->getName()<<"\" created.";
00136   else {
00137     throw MultipleReactors(*this, **(ret.first));
00138   }                     
00139   return ret.first->get();
00140 }
00141 
00142 graph::reactor_id graph::add_reactor(graph::reactor_id r) {
00143   boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> tmp(r);  
00144   std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool> ret = m_reactors.insert(tmp);
00145   // As it is an internal call make is silent for now ...
00146   return ret.first->get();
00147 }
00148 
00149 bool graph::kill_reactor(graph::reactor_id r) {
00150   if( null_reactor()!=r ) {
00151     details::reactor_set::iterator pos = m_reactors.find(r->getName());
00152     
00153     if( pos->get()==r ) {
00154       // clean up relations
00155       syslog()<<"Destroying reactor \""<<r->getName()<<"\".";
00156       m_reactors.erase(pos);
00157       return true;
00158     }
00159   }
00160   return false;
00161 }
00162 
00163 graph::reactor_id graph::isolate(graph::reactor_id r) const {
00164   if( null_reactor()!=r ) {
00165     details::reactor_set::const_iterator pos = m_reactors.find(r->getName());
00166     if( pos->get()==r ) {
00167       syslog()<<"Putting reactor\""<<r->getName()<<"\" in quarantine.";
00168       r->isolate();
00169       return r;
00170     }
00171   }
00172   return null_reactor();
00173 }
00174 
00175 details::timeline_set::iterator graph::get_timeline(Symbol const &tl) {
00176   details::timeline *cand = new details::timeline(m_currentTick, tl);
00177   std::pair<details::timeline_set::iterator, bool>
00178     ret = m_timelines.insert(cand);
00179   if( ret.second ) 
00180     syslog()<<"Timeline \""<<tl.str()<<"\" created.";
00181   else
00182     delete cand;
00183   return ret.first;
00184 }
00185 
00186 graph::size_type graph::count_relations() const {
00187   size_t res = 0;
00188   for(details::timeline_set::const_iterator i=m_timelines.begin();
00189       m_timelines.end()!=i; ++i )
00190     res += (*i)->size();
00191   return res;
00192 }
00193 
00194 
00195 bool graph::assign(graph::reactor_id r, Symbol const &timeline) {
00196   details::timeline_set::iterator tl = get_timeline(timeline);
00197   return (*tl)->assign(*r);
00198 }
00199 
00200 bool graph::subscribe(reactor_id r, Symbol const &timeline, bool control) {
00201   details::timeline_set::iterator tl = get_timeline(timeline);
00202   return (*tl)->subscribe(*r, control);
00203 }
